about.label: About Us
about.title: A Home for Rest and Enjoyment
about.description: Panorama House Aljmaš is a family-run property that combines comfort, nature, and peace. Situated on a hill above the Danube, our home offers a unique panoramic view that takes your breath away. Enjoy the private pool, jacuzzi, and sauna, and experience rural tourism with a touch of luxury.
about.imageAlt: Panorama House Aljmaš with panoramic Danube view
about.description2: With air-conditioned accommodation for 5+2 guests, Panorama House is the ideal place for a family vacation or a getaway with friends. Spacious rooms, a barbecue, a modern kitchen, and a cozy living room create the perfect atmosphere for socializing and relaxation.
highlights: Close to cultural and natural attractions of Aljmaš
about.experienceText1: Every stay at Panorama House is designed to be carefree. You'll be greeted by a tidy space, fresh linens, and carefully prepared details that emphasize the warmth of a home atmosphere.
about.experienceText2: Our location provides quick access to the Danube, local gastronomy, and cultural landmarks of Aljmaš. Whether you're looking for an active vacation or complete peace, Panorama House offers a great balance.

location.label: Location
location.title: Discover Aljmaš
location.description: Aljmaš is a small settlement located on the right bank of the Danube, not far from Osijek. Known for its pristine nature, this area offers numerous opportunities for walks, cycling, and fishing. Nearby you'll find local restaurants with traditional cuisine, as well as landmarks that make every stay special.
